title: Opinion: STAT+: What Ozempic might tell us about the future of Alzheimer’s
description: Someday, there will be a game-changing drug for Alzheimer’s. It’s worth thinking about that now.
content: Someday, there will be a game-changing drug for Alzheimer’s. It’s worth thinking about that now.
